pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bhavcopy and Live Market Data from National Stock Exchange (NSE) Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) India for Equities and Equity Derivatives (FO) // Download Current Historical Bhavcopy from NSE (National Stock Exchnage) and BSE (Bombay Stock Exchange). Get Live Market data from NSE India of Equities and Derivatives(FO) segment. Data source https://www.nseindia.com/.
